body_html: @fmassa yes, the rules for exact promotion in binary ops are defined in np.result_type, but it heavily depends on np.promote_types (but handles scalars specially). I implemented that in another PR, but Greg needed this particluar function to implement other stuff.
body_text: @fmassa yes, the rules for exact promotion in binary ops are defined in np.result_type, but it heavily depends on np.promote_types (but handles scalars specially). I implemented that in another PR, but Greg needed this particluar function to implement other stuff.
body: @fmassa yes, the rules for exact promotion in binary ops are defined in `np.result_type`, but it heavily depends on `np.promote_types` (but handles scalars specially). I implemented that in another PR, but Greg needed this particluar function to implement other stuff.
